metadata.title: CVE-2022-40151 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: Those using Xstream to seralize XML data may be vulnerable to Denial ofService attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, anattacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash bystackoverflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
